home.text_base_description: Perched atop of Nob Hill, with sweeping views of the Transamerica Building, Coit Tower, and the Bay, this full floor residence combines the modern design of today with the iconic San Francisco views that define the City's past. The open floor plan condo with chic newly remodeled modern interior and a key-controlled lift directly into the unit has jaw dropping panoramic views of the San Francisco skyline which instantly captivate and mesmerize. This 2+ bed, 2 bath condo offers a flexible third bedroom that is perfect for a home office. Custom kitchen cabinetry, Nuvo Calacatta countertops and island, Sub Zero refrigerator, and Bosch appliance suite are only some of the high end features of this open kitchen . The Almost floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows at night invite the sparkling city into your living room. Steps to some of San Francisco's best restaurants and a short walk to the financial district makes this fantastic condo truly the perfect balance of convenience and style.
